description: Episode of Series "Disordered Mind". A case history of a psychosomatic condition. Describes the unhappiness of an overweight 13 year old girl, who eats because she is depressed and is depressed because she is overweight. There is a lack of communication between the girl and her mother which causes frustration. Dr Henry Kravitz discusses the treatment to be used between the girl and her parents.
